phase1

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • phase1.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates a game that initalizes all decks and adds players to the game.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        public Game(int NUM_PLAYERS)
        Implements a game object that has the number of players as a parameter. The number of players may be 2 to 3. For invalid values for number of players provided, 2 will be used.
        Parameters:
        NUM_PLAYERS - number of players; 2 will be used if invalid

        public boolean gameOver()
